Parameters.Name: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response with Data.SimpleItem "External"
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Reason="CredentialNotEnabled"

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Fault on PM
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token DUT sends fault on timeout in PullMessage

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: No wsnt:Message in notification message
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Notification message contains no wsnt:Message elements - NotificationMessage does not correspond to schema

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: More than one NotificationMessage
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token DUT sends 2 NotificationMessages on PullMessage request

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: Renew during waiting of PM response
Test.Description: Set Subscription timeout to 30s (in TT GUI) Set Operation delay to 120 s DUT sends PullMessages response in 55s. Check that TT seds Renew during waiting of PM response

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: no event during Operation delay
Test.Description: Set Subscription timeout to 120s (in TT GUI) Set Operation delay to 30 s DUT sends no event during 30 s Check that TT does not send Renew after the first PM response message, check that DUT delete Subscription and failed test

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: event was sent during Operation delay at second attempt
Test.Description: Set Subscription timeout to 120s (in TT GUI) Set Operation delay to 120 s DUT sends the first PullMessagesResponse in 55 s without event Check that DUT sends Renew Check that TT sends the second PullMessageRequest

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: PM response at first attempt with real delay
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Set Operation Delay to 60 s Set Termination time to 60 s DUT sends PullMessages with event in 30 s

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Fault on Renew
Test.Description: Set Subscription timeout to 120s (in TT GUI) Set Operation delay to 120 s DUT sends the first PullMessagesResponse in 55 s without event DUT sends fault on Renew

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: No response on PullMessages"
Test.Description: Set Subscription timeout to 120 s Set Operation delay to 30 s DUT sends no response on PullMessages Check that TT will delete Subscription

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Fault on Unsubscribe
Test.Description: DUT sends fault on Unsubscribe. Check that DUT will delete subscription. Test shall be passed.

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: No response on Unsubscribe
Test.Description: DUT sends no response on Unsubscribe. Check that DUT will delete subscription. Test shall be passed.

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Corect response: UnacceptableTerminationTimeFault on Renew
Test.Description: Set Subscription timeout to 60s (in TT GUI) Set Operation delay to 120 s DUT sends the first PullMessagesResponse in 55 s without event DUT sends UnacceptableTerminationTimeFault on Renew with included acceptable values for InitialTerminationTime

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: event was sent during Operation delay at the third attempt
Test.Description: Set Subscription timeout to 90s (in TT GUI) Set Operation delay to 300 s DUT sends the first PullMessagesResponse in 55 s without event Check that DUT sends Renew Check that TT sends the second and the third PullMessageRequest

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Check unsubscribe after renew
Test.Description: Set Subscription timeout to 65s (in TT GUI) Set Operation delay to 120 s DUT sends the first PullMessagesResponse in 55 s without event DUT sends Renew DUT sends event in the second PullMessageRequest without delay Check that IT ends subscription session by Unsubscribe invoking
